text.section:
No later than December 1, 2000, the Secretary of Human Resources and the Secretary of Health and Mental Hygiene shall submit a report to the Governor and, subject to § 2-1246 of the State Government Article, the Senate Budget and Taxation Committee, the Senate Economic and Environmental Affairs Committee, the House Appropriations Committee, and the House Environmental Matters Committee that:
sets forth the statewide protocol developed under this section; and
identifies the amount and sources of funds that are being used to implement the statewide protocol developed under this section and the other requirements of this subtitle.
The statewide protocol developed under this section shall be implemented in each county of the State.
